Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes
Net Income: net income loss available to common shareholders after required adjustments
net income loss available to common shareholders basic after required adjustments
net income loss available to common stockholders basic
net income loss from continuing operations available to common shareholders after required adjustments
net income loss from continuing operations available to common stockholders basic

Other Income (Expense): interest income expense after provision for loan loss
interest income expense after provision for loan loss abstract
trading activity gains and losses net
noncredit related losses on securities not expected to be sold

Other Operating Expenses: merger and integration litigation and restructuring charges
provision for loan lease and other losses
noninterest expense transfer agent and custodian fees

Basic EPS: income loss from continuing operations per basic share
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Bas: weighted average number of shares outstanding basic
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Dil: weighted average number diluted shares outstanding adjustment
weighted average number of diluted shares outstanding

Total Revenues: securities servicing and treasury services fees
total revenues including revenue generated by variable interest entities

__unmapped__: antidilutive securities excluded from computation of earnings per share amount
change in excess of redeemable value over fair value of noncontrolling interests
discontinued operation income loss from discontinued operation before income tax
discontinued operation tax effect of discontinued operation
excess of redeemable value over fair value of noncontrolling interests
expense related to distribution or servicing and underwriting fees
income loss from continuing operations attributable to noncontrolling entity
income loss from continuing operations including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
incremental common shares attributable to participating nonvested shares with non forfeitable dividend rights
participating securities distributed and undistributed earnings basicand diluted
participating securities distributed and undistributed earnings loss basic
preferred stock dividends income statement impact
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
